actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

official_title: To amend section 6901 of title 31, United States Code, to provide for certain lands taken into trust for Indian tribes to be included in the definition of entitlement land.

summary.text: Amends Federal law relating to payment for entitlement land to include in the definition of entitlement land certain lands taken into trust for Indian tribes.

titles.title: To amend section 6901 of title 31, United States Code, to provide for certain lands taken into trust for Indian tribes to be included in the definition of entitlement land.
